trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event occurs when a control is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>hendelsen oppstår når en kontroll tegnes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>

trans-unit.source: A PaintEventArgs specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A> to use to paint the control and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.ClipRectangle%2A> in which to paint.
trans-unit.target: Angir en PaintEventArgs av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A>skal brukes til å maler kontrollen og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.ClipRectangle%2A>der fargemerknader.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.ClipRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information about the event model, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hendelsen modellen, kan du se [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified graphics and clipping rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> klassen med den angitte grafikk og beskjæring rektangel.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> identified by the `graphics` parameter is disposed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> is disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>identifisert av den `graphics` parameteren er fjernet når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>er fjernet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the item.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> brukes til å fargemerknader elementet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the rectangle in which to paint.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer rektangelet som mal.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle in which to paint.
trans-unit.target: Henter rektanglet som mal.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> in which to paint.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som mal.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Kall avhending når du er ferdig med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Fjerningsmetoden forlater den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>i en ubrukelig tilstand.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Etter å avhending, må du frigi alle referanser til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>Slik saneringsoppsamlingen kan gjenvinne minnet som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>ble bruker.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [implementere metoden fjerne](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid kall fjerne før du slipper siste referanse til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Ellers ressurser den bruker vil ikke bli frigjort før saneringsoppsamling kall av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>objektets `Finalize` metode.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig `Dispose()` metoden og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected Dispose method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`Aktiverer beskyttede fjerningsmetoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>aktiverer `Dispose` med `disposing` satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing` -parameteren er SANN, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>referanser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose()` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Gjør det mulig for et objekt å prøve å frigjøre ressurser og utføre andre operasjoner for opprydding før den er gode av datasanering.

trans-unit.source: Gets the graphics used to paint.
trans-unit.target: Henter grafikk brukes til å mal.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to paint.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objekt for mal.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object provides methods for drawing objects on the display device.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objektet inneholder metoder for å tegne objekter på visningsenheten.
